label: serpent
info: Lua serializer and pretty printer. Auto included in Factorios Lua Api, so you can use it

properties.label: dump
properties.info:
Params: [table, options]
Serializes a Lua value (usually a table) into a Lua source string that can be safely loaded back with load/loadstring.

properties.label: line
properties.info:
Params: [table, options]
Returns a compact one-line version of the serialization. Useful for logging or inline display.

properties.label: block
properties.info:
Params: [table, options]
Returns a pretty-printed, multi-line serialization of the table. Good for configuration files or readable dumps.

properties.label: load
properties.info:
Params: [serialized_string]
Loads the Lua object back from a serialized string (if `safe` option is disabled and Lua supports loadstring/load).

properties.label: _VERSION
properties.info: Contains the version string of the Serpent library (e.g., 'Serpent 0.303').
